mapper.select: SELECT USERSCODE, NAME FROM STAFF WHERE DPCODE=4 AND POSITIONCODE=4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUIDE(SCHCODE, GUIDENAME, TIMEZONE, WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, USERSCODE) VALUES(GUIDE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{timezone}, #{workDate}, #{role}, #{memo}, #{usersCode})
mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM STAFF WHERE USERSCODE= #{usersCode}
SELECT G.SCHCODE, GUIDENAME AS NAME, TIMEZONE,WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, G.USERSCODE, BOOKCODE FROM GUIDE G LEFT OUTER JOIN GUIDEBOOK GB ON G.SCHCODE = GB.SCHCODE WHERE G.SCHCODE !=0

SELECT G.SCHCODE, GUIDENAME, TIMEZONE, TO_CHAR(WORKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, G.USERSCODE, GB.USERSCODE AS USERSCODEM, BOOKCODE, TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOKDATE, TEL, NAME AS NAMEM, MEMBERID FROM GUIDE G LEFT OUTER JOIN GUIDEBOOK GB ON G.SCHCODE = GB.SCHCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER1 M ON M.USERSCODE = GB.USERSCODE WHERE G.SCHCODE = #{schCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE GUIDEBOOK SET SCHCODE = 0 WHERE SCHCODE = #{schCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUIDEBOOK(BOOKCODE, SCHCODE, NAME, TEL, USERSCODE, BOOKDATE) VALUES(GUIDEBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{schCode}, #{nameM},#{tel}, #{usersCodeM}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT TICKETCODE, M1.USERSCODE AS usersCodeM, TO_CHAR(STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(ENDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ENDDATE, GUBUN FROM TICKET T JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.PAYCODE = T.PAYCODE JOIN MEMBER1 M1 ON M1.USERSCODE = P.USERSCODE WHERE M1.USERSCODE = #{usersCode} AND (GUBUN != 5 AND GUBUN != 6 )

SELECT TICKETCODE, M1.USERSCODE AS usersCodeM, TO_CHAR(STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(ENDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ENDDATE, GUBUN FROM TICKET T JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.PAYCODE = T.PAYCODE JOIN MEMBER1 M1 ON M1.USERSCODE = P.USERSCODE WHERE M1.USERSCODE = #{usersCode}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM GUIDEBOOK GB JOIN GUIDE G ON G.SCHCODE = GB.SCHCODE WHERE WORKDATE = #{workDate}
